name: Luigi Colani

The company aims to create a harmonious blend of design and olfactory experience, attracting a niche market of fragrance lovers and design enthusiasts alike.

Founded on the belief that scents can significantly impact well-being, they integrate the principles of aromatherapy in their products, aiming to promote relaxation, energy, and overall health benefits. The company focuses on using natural ingredients and blends to enhance physical and emotional wellness, offering a range of products including scented oils and diffusers.

name: Maher Olfactive
description: Maher Olfactive is a high-end niche perfume house known for creating unique and artisanal fragrances. The company emphasizes minimalism and the art of scent creation, often using rare and high-quality ingredients. Founded by Anis Maher, the brand reflects a deep passion for olfactory experiences and the storytelling behind each fragrance. Maher Olfactive aims to cater to an audience that appreciates distinctive, carefully crafted perfumes rather than mass market options.
address: 14 Rue de la Paix, 75002 Paris, France

name: Mahogany
description: Mahogany is a specialized perfume company that focuses on creating unique fragrance blends inspired by the rich cultural heritage and natural beauty of its environment. The brand emphasizes high-quality ingredients and artisanal craftsmanship, aiming to deliver a luxurious olfactory experience. Their products often reflect a deep connection to nature and are designed for those who appreciate distinctive scents that evoke a sense of identity and place.

name: Mahra M1
description: Mahra M1 is a luxury perfume brand known for its exquisite and high-quality fragrance offerings. The company specializes in crafting unique scents that blend traditional Arabian perfumery methods with modern elements, aiming to provide a rich sensory experience for its customers. Their fragrances are inspired by nature and cultural heritage, appealing to a niche audience that values artisanal craftsmanship.

name: Maie Piou
description: Maie Piou is a boutique perfume company known for its artisanal approach to fragrance creation. The brand emphasizes natural ingredients and sustainable sourcing, catering to discerning clients who appreciate unique and crafted scents. Founded by a passionate perfumer with a background in aromatherapy, Maie Piou seeks to tell stories through fragrances, allowing wearers to connect emotionally to the scents they choose. The company specializes in limited editions and custom fragrances made to order, ensuring each product maintains a personal touch.

name: Mair
description: Mair is a boutique perfume company specializing in crafting exquisite and unique fragrances that embody elegance and sophistication. Founded by a team of passionate perfumers, Mair aims to innovate within the perfume industry by blending traditional techniques with modern sensibilities. Their fragrances often tell a story, drawing inspiration from various cultures, nature, and artisanal craftsmanship, making each scent a distinct experience. Mair focuses on quality ingredients and ethical sourcing, appealing to a discerning clientele that values both artistry and sustainability.
address: 47 Rue de Faubourg Saint-Antoine, 75011 Paris, France

name: Maira Jung
description: Maira Jung is a niche perfume company known for its unique and artisanal fragrances. Founded by perfumer Maira Jung, the brand emphasizes individuality and creativity in scent creation, curating fragrances that blend natural ingredients with modern olfactory techniques. The company's story is rooted in the belief that perfume can be a personal expression of identity and emotion, and each scent is designed to evoke specific feelings and memories. Maira Jung specializes in small-batch production, ensuring high quality and exclusivity in each product.

name: Maison Alhambra
description: Maison Alhambra is a niche fragrance house known for its luxurious and artistic scents inspired by diverse cultures and histories. Established with a vision to celebrate the beauty of traditional perfumery intertwined with contemporary creativity, Maison Alhambra offers an exclusive range of perfumes that evoke emotion and tell a story through each carefully crafted fragrance. The brand emphasizes high-quality ingredients and artisanal techniques, making it a notable player in the niche perfume segment.

name: Maison Anonyme
description: Maison Anonyme is a niche perfume company that focuses on creating unique and artisanal fragrances that evoke stories and emotions. The brand is dedicated to the art of perfumery, blending high-quality ingredients with innovative concepts, resulting in original scents that cater to a discerning audience. Maison Anonyme emphasizes craftsmanship and individual artistry in fragrance creation, often collaborating with renowned perfumers to develop signature scents that reflect their philosophies and inspirations.

name: Maison Asrar
description: Maison Asrar is known for its commitment to crafting high-quality, luxury fragrances that blend traditional perfume-making techniques with modern aesthetics. Each scent is designed to evoke emotions and transport wearers to different times and places. The company prides itself on using the finest raw materials sourced globally, ensuring a unique olfactory experience that is both innovative and timeless. Founded by a team of passionate perfumers, Maison Asrar seeks to redefine personal scent by emphasizing individuality and self-expression through fragrance.

name: Maison Berger
description: Maison Berger is a French company known for its air freshening products and home fragrances. Established in 1898, they initially focused on creating a lamp that effectively purifies the air, an innovation that set them apart in the fragrance market. Over time, the company expanded its offerings to include a wide array of scented candles, home diffusers, and refillable fragrance lamps. Their products are designed to enhance the ambiance of a space while providing aromatic experiences through expertly crafted scents.
address: 26 Rue du Fer à Moulin, 75005 Paris, France

name: Maison Chanceux
description: Maison Chanceux is a luxury perfume brand known for its unique and artisanal approach to fragrance creation. The company was established with the goal of crafting high-quality perfumes that capture the essence of various stories and emotions. Each fragrance is designed to evoke a specific feeling or memory, reflecting a deep understanding of the art of perfumery. Maison Chanceux prides itself on using natural ingredients and sustainable practices, ensuring that each scent not only smells delightful but also aligns with eco-friendly values. Their specialty lies in tailored scent experiences and limited edition releases that appeal to discerning fragrance aficionados.
address: 10 Rue des Fragrances, 75001 Paris, France

name: Maison Crivelli
description: Maison Crivelli is a niche perfume house founded by Thibaud Crivelli. Established in 2016 in France, the brand is known for its unique and innovative approach to fragrance, emphasizing the art of perfumery through unexpected scents and high-quality ingredients. Maison Crivelli draws inspiration from various sources, including nature, art, and personal experiences, to create distinctive and original perfumes that challenge conventional fragrance norms. The brand is celebrated for its artistic storytelling and emphasis on the sensory experience offered by each fragrance, making it a standout in the niche perfume market.

name: Maison de Darius
description: Maison de Darius is a boutique fragrance house known for its artisanal approach to perfume-making. Established with a mission to create unique olfactory experiences, the company draws inspiration from various cultural influences and traditional craftsmanship. Their specialty lies in blending premium ingredients to formulate exclusive and luxurious scents that evoke emotions and memories, focusing on quality over quantity.
address: 12 Rue de la Parfumerie, Paris, France

name: Maison de L'Asie
description: Maison de L'Asie is a niche perfume house that specializes in creating unique fragrances inspired by the rich cultural heritage and diverse elements of Asia. Founded by a passionate perfumer who sought to bring Asian inspirations into the world of scent, the company focuses on high-quality ingredients and artisanal crafting. Each fragrance tells a story, connecting to Asian traditions, landscapes, and experiences, offering a sensory journey that transcends borders and cultures.
address: 45 Rue des Francs Bourgeois, 75003 Paris, France

name: Maison de Parfum Berry
description: Maison de Parfum Berry is a niche perfume company that specializes in crafting high-quality, unique fragrances. Founded by perfumer Berry in a small workshop, the brand emerged from a passion for scent and a desire to create perfumes that evoke memories and emotions. The company prides itself on using natural ingredients sourced from around the world and employs traditional perfumery methods to create their exclusive scent collections. Maison de Parfum Berry appeals to connoisseurs and fragrance aficionados looking for artisanal options that stand apart from mainstream offerings.
address: 15 Rue de la Parfumerie, Paris, France

name: Maison des Animaux
description: Maison des Animaux is a niche perfume company that specializes in creating unique fragrances inspired by animals and nature. The brand aims to capture the essence of various animals and their habitats, translating them into olfactory experiences. Founded by a group of passionate perfumers and animal lovers, Maison des Animaux combines artistic expression with natural ingredients to offer a distinct line of perfumes. Their story reflects a commitment to sustainability and ethical practices in sourcing materials and producing scents that resonate with eco-conscious consumers.
address: 21 Rue du Faubourg Saint-Antoine, 75011 Paris, France

name: Maison des Reves
description: Maison des Reves is a luxury perfume house known for crafting unique, artisanal fragrances that evoke dreamy experiences. The company focuses on blending high-quality ingredients with innovative scent compositions to create a sensory journey that transports users to various realms of imagination. Their philosophy centers around storytelling through fragrance, allowing each perfume to encapsulate a specific theme or memory.
address: 15 Rue de la Liberté, Paris, France

name: Maison d'Hauteville
description: Maison d'Hauteville is a niche perfume house that specializes in crafting unique and luxurious fragrances, focusing on the art of perfumery with an emphasis on high-quality ingredients and artistic expression. The brand is known for its exquisite scents inspired by emotions and memories, creating a distinctive olfactory experience. Their story reflects a commitment to traditional craftsmanship while embracing contemporary aesthetics, establishing themselves as a prominent player in the niche perfume market.

name: Maison Douze
description: Maison Douze is a luxury perfume house that specializes in artisanal fragrances crafted using traditional techniques and high-quality ingredients. The brand aims to create unique olfactory experiences that evoke emotions and memories. Their story began with a passion for perfumery, diving deep into the art of scent creation and honoring the cultural heritage of fragrance making. Maison Douze focuses on small-batch production, emphasizing personal connection and storytelling through their scents.

name: Maison Francis Kurkdjian
description: Maison Francis Kurkdjian is a French luxury perfume house founded in 2001 by renowned perfumer Francis Kurkdjian. The company emphasizes artistry and craftsmanship in fragrance creation, blending traditional techniques with modern concepts. Kurkdjian, famous for his innovative approach, aims to evoke emotions through his scents. The brand is known for creating signature fragrances that embody sophistication, luxury, and a sense of identity, appealing to a discerning clientele.

name: Maison Héritage
description: Maison Héritage is a niche perfume house known for its artisanal approach to fragrance creation, focusing on high-quality ingredients and traditional craftsmanship. The company draws inspiration from the rich heritage of perfumery and combines this with contemporary aesthetics. Their products often reflect a fusion of classic elegance with modern sensibilities, aiming to provide consumers with unique and personally resonant scents.
address: 25 Rue des Fleurs, Paris, France

name: Maison Incens
description: Maison Incens specializes in creating high-quality fragrances inspired by traditional incense and natural ingredients. The company has a rich history of blending aromatic elements to evoke a sense of serenity and inspiration. Their specialty lies in crafting unique scents that reflect the heritage and artistry of perfumery, with a focus on artisan methods and sustainable sourcing.
address: 25 Rue des Martyrs, 75009 Paris, France

name: Maison Kitsuné
description: Maison Kitsuné is a Paris-based fashion and music label founded in 2002 by Gildas Loaëc and Masaya Kuroki. The brand seamlessly blends contemporary fashion with music, offering a range of products that include clothing, accessories, and an expanding line of fragrances. Their perfumes reflect an aesthetic that embodies a stylish mix of Japanese and French cultural influences, focusing on quality materials and innovative scents. Maison Kitsuné is renowned for its unique approach to lifestyle branding, fostering a community of creators and trendsetters through collaborations and events.

name: Maison Louboutin
description: Maison Louboutin is a luxury perfume house established by renowned French designer Christian Louboutin, best known for his iconic red-soled shoes. The brand's fragrance offerings reflect the elegance and eclectic spirit of the Louboutin aesthetic, combining high-quality ingredients with unique presentations. The perfumes are designed to evoke a sense of empowerment and confidence, mirroring the boldness of Louboutin's footwear. Each scent is crafted to be both a personal expression and a statement of luxury, showcasing the artistic sensibility that defines the Maison.

name: Maison Louis Marie
description: Maison Louis Marie is a niche fragrance house that specializes in the creation of high-quality, botanical-based scents. Founded by Marie du Petit Thouars, the company draws on her family's rich history in the perfume industry to create unique, artisanal fragrances that are sophisticated and evocative. Their collections often emphasize the use of natural ingredients and are inspired by Marie's travels and the botanical gardens she has encountered around the world. The brand is known for its minimalist aesthetic and dedication to craftsmanship.

name: Maison Maissa
description: Maison Maissa is a luxury perfume brand known for its artisanal craftsmanship and unique scent creations. Founded by fragrance enthusiast Maissa Belhassan, the company focuses on blending traditional perfumery techniques with modern interpretations to create distinctive, evocative fragrances. The brand emphasizes high-quality ingredients and aims to offer a sensory journey through its curated collection of perfumes, drawing inspiration from diverse cultures and personal experiences.

name: Maison Marinelie
description: Maison Marinelie is a fragrance house that emphasizes the art of perfumery, focusing on creating unique and evocative scents. The brand was founded on the philosophy of capturing emotions and memories through fragrance, employing a blend of traditional craftsmanship and modern sensibilities. Maison Marinelie specializes in artisanal perfumes that are often inspired by nature, personal experiences, and cultural heritage, ensuring that each creation tells its own story. The company prides itself on using high-quality ingredients and innovative techniques to craft distinctive fragrances that resonate with their clientele.

name: Maison Mataha
description: Maison Mataha is a perfume company that specializes in creating luxurious, handcrafted fragrances inspired by the art and culture of the Middle East. Founded by a team of passionate artisans and perfume makers, the company focuses on using high-quality ingredients and traditional techniques to craft unique scents that capture the essence of elegance and sophistication. Maison Mataha is dedicated to sustainability and innovation, often collaborating with local artists to integrate cultural elements into their perfume creations.

name: Maison Matine
description: Maison Matine is a French perfume house known for its unique and creative fragrances that celebrate individuality and diversity. Established as a tribute to the avant-garde spirit of Paris, the brand seeks to break traditional boundaries in perfumery by offering eclectic scents that appeal to a broad audience. Maison Matine combines high-quality ingredients with contemporary design, presenting each fragrance in minimalist yet striking packaging. Their commitment to sustainability and ethical sourcing adds another layer to their appeal, allowing customers to enjoy luxury fragrances with a conscience.

name: Maison Millais
description: Maison Millais is a luxury fragrance brand that specializes in creating high-quality, artisanal perfumes. Founded by a passionate perfumer, the brand embodies the fusion of traditional craftsmanship and modern sensibilities. Maison Millais aims to offer a unique olfactory experience, inspired by the rich heritage of perfumery, while also emphasizing sustainable practices in sourcing its ingredients. The company prides itself on meticulous attention to detail, ensuring that each fragrance tells a story and evokes a sense of place and emotion.
